channel.title: Need Help With this as soon as possible... Posted again because noone answers
channel.description:
I've noticed that I've treied everything in the Book to Compile. But my compiler finds an Invalid file.
Here's The ~Compiler.edit~
[code]@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling all files.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java pause[/code]
Now that Code must have a flaw because When I try compiling this is what comes out.
[code]Compiling all files.... javac: invalid flag: ../build/ Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I need some better results, please help me as soon as possible.
~Ambriosa1~

item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

For one, on a packaged server, it’s a pain in the ass to browse through folders so I suggest downloading an IDE.
I suggest Netbeans, IntelliJ IDEA, or Eclipse.
Whichever suits your needs.
